fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Learn the **original** role a player had at the beginning of the game (Day 1), before it was ever changed.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you exist, at the beginning of the day, select an alternative uninformed majority faction. All Town roles will become roles of that faction, but keep their alignment. If a certain alignment doesn't exist, it will be any role of that faction.
- Current options: Florae, City, Sentries
- Cope, seethe and mald
